t1.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t21.`SHORTNAME` AS `ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`PCMJXSYGZZJLMXID`, t1.`PCMRCXLID`, t41.`PCMRCXLNAME`, t1.`PIMCITYID`, t51.`PIMCITYNAME`, t1.`PIMMAJORSETYPEID`, t1.`SYQDQSJ`, t1.`TOZJDATE`, t1.`TRANSFERDATE`, t1.`TXDQ`, (case when t1.`SJTXRQ` is null then null when TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH,IFNULL(t1.`SJTXRQ`,sysdate()),sysdate())<=0 THEN CAST(floor(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH,IFNULL(t1.`SJTXRQ`,sysdate()),sysdate())) AS CHAR(3)) else 'N/A' end) AS `TXNX`, (case when (TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH,IFNULL(t1.`SJTXRQ`,sysdate()),sysdate())>-7 and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH,IFNULL(t1.`SJTXRQ`,sysdate()),sysdate())<=-1) then '30' when TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH,IFNULL(t1.`SJTXRQ`,sysdate()),sysdate())>-1 then '20' else '10' end) AS `TXNX_COLOR`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`WORKSTATE`, t1.`XB`, t1.`XTBH`, t1.`XX`, t1.`YDZT`, t1.`YGBH`, t1.`YGBHQYSJ`, t1.`YGLX`, t1.`YGZT`, t1.`YJSNF`, t1.`YYGBH`, case when t1.`YGZT` in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS `ZGCODE`, t1.`ZGZT`, t1.`ZJ`, t1.`ZJHM`, t1.`ZJLX`, t1.`ZJNX`, t1.`ZP`, t1.`ZT`, t1.`ZW`, t1.`ZWNX`, t1.`ZWRQ`, (select group_concat(c2.PIMTITLECATALOGUENAME) from T_PIMTITLE c1 ,T_PIMTITLECATALOGUE c2 where c1.PIMTITLECATALOGUEID = c2.PIMTITLECATALOGUEID and c1.PIMPERSONID=t1.`PIMPERSONID`) AS `ZYJSZW`, t1.`ZYZG`, t11.`ZZDZS`, t1.`ZZMM` FROM `T_PIMPERSON` t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t11 ON t1.ORMORGID = t11.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t21 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t21.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMMAJORSETYPE t31 ON t1.PIMMAJORSETYPEID = t31.PIMMAJORSETYPEID LEFT JOIN T_PCMRCXL t41 ON t1.PCMRCXLID = t41.PCMRCXLID LEFT JOIN T_PIMCITY t51 ON t1.PIMCITYID = t51.PIMCITYID ) t1 where pimpersonid=#{id}

t1.PIMMAJORSETYPEID = t31.PIMMAJORSETYPEID LEFT JOIN T_PCMRCXL t41 ON t1.PCMRCXLID = t41.PCMRCXLID LEFT JOIN T_PIMCITY t51 ON t1.PIMCITYID = t51.PIMCITYID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( ( t1.`YGZT` = '50' select agetype,count(1) as countnum from ( select case when age<=30 then '30' when age>=31 and age<=35 then '31' when age>=36 and age<=40 then '36' when age>=41 and age<=45 then '41' when age>=46 and age<=50 then '46' when age>=51 and age<=55 then '51' else '55' end agetype from ( select timestampdiff(year,t1.CSRQ,sysdate()) AS age from t_pimperson t1 where YGZT not in ('40','50','60','130','51') and jlss='10' and enable=1 ) x ) y group by agetype
select ormtype,count(1) as countnum from BIS_EMPLOYEEANALYSIS_T group by ormtype
